description.english: You have joined the KKK.
description.german: Du hast dich dem KKK angeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez rejoint le KKK.
description.italian: Ti sei unito al KKK.
description.spanish: Te has unido al KKK.
description.russian: Ты присоединился к К.К.К.
description.portuguese: Você se juntou ao KKK.
description.polish: Dołączyłeś do KKK.
description.brazilian: You have joined the KKK.

description.english: You completed your first day in South Park.
description.german: Du hast deinen ersten Tag in South Park verbracht.
description.french: Vous avez achevé votre première journée à South Park.
description.italian: Hai completato il tuo primo giorno a South Park.
description.spanish: Has completado tu primer día en South Park.
description.russian: Твой первый день в Южном парке окончен.
description.polish: Ukończyłeś swój pierwszy dzień w South Parku.
description.brazilian: You completed your first day in South Park.
description.portuguese: Você completou o seu primeiro dia em South Park.

description.english: You defeated the High Jew Elf Kyle in battle.
description.german: Du hast den Hochjudenelf Kyle im Kampf besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Kyle, le Grand elfe juif, au combat.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto in battaglia Kyle, l'Alto Elfo ebreo.
description.spanish: Has derrotado en combate a Kyle, el alto elfo judío.
description.russian: Ты победил высшего эльфа-еврея Кайла.
description.portuguese: Você derrotou Kyle, o Elfo Altaneiro Judeu, em batalha.
description.polish: Pokonałeś w walce żydowskiego hierarchę Kyle'a.
description.brazilian: You defeated the High Jew Elf Kyle in battle.

description.english: You defeated the Grand Wizard Cartman in battle.
description.german: Du hast Großmagus Cartman im Kampf besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu  Cartman, le Grand enchanteur, au combat.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto in battaglia il Grande Mago Cartman.
description.spanish: Has derrotado en combate a Cartman, el Gran Mago.
description.russian: Ты победил Великого Магистра Картмана.
description.portuguese: Você derrotou Cartman, o Grande Mago, em batalha.
description.polish: Pokonałeś w walce Wielkiego Czarodzieja Cartmana.
description.brazilian: You defeated the Grand Wizard Cartman in battle.

description.english: You befriended the Goths, like everyone else playing this game.
description.german: Du hast dich mit den Goths angefreundet, wie alle anderen, die das Spiel spielen.
description.french: Vous avez sympathisé avec les gothiques, comme tout joueur qui se respecte.
description.italian: Hai fatto amicizia con i dark, come qualsiasi altra persona che sta giocando a questo gioco.
description.spanish: Te has hecho amigo de los góticos, como todos los demás que juegan a esto.
description.russian: Ты подружился с готами, как и все остальные, играющие в эту игру.
description.portuguese: Você ficou amigo dos góticos, assim como todos jogando este jogo.
description.polish: Zaprzyjaźniłeś się z gotami, jak wszyscy, którzy grają w tę grę.
description.brazilian: You befriended the Goths, like everyone else playing this game.

description.english: Gingers have bitten you 3 times without you blocking.
description.german: Rotschöpfe haben dich 3 Mal gebissen, ohne dass du geblockt hast.
description.french: Les rouquins vous ont mordu 3 fois sans que vous les ayez bloqués.
description.italian: Ti sei fatto mordere 3 volte dai pel di carota senza parare.
description.spanish: Los pelirrojos te han mordido 3 veces sin que los bloquees.
description.russian: Ты не заблокировал три укуса рыжих.
description.polish: Przyjąłeś 3 ugryzienia rudzielców bez blokowania.
description.brazilian: Gingers have bitten you 3 times without you blocking.
description.portuguese: Os ruivos lhe morderam 3 vezes sem que você bloqueasse.

description.english: You defeated the Boss Hall Monitor while wearing freckles.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le Boss Surveillant de couloir en portant des taches de son.
description.german: Du hast den Gangaufsicht-Boss besiegt, während du Sommersprossen getragen hast.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al vigilante del pasillo jefe llevando pecas.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il capo dei sorveglianti del corridoio mentre avevi le lentiggini.
description.russian: Ты наклеил веснушки и в таком виде победил босса-дежурного.
description.brazilian: You defeated the Boss Hall Monitor while wearing freckles.
description.polish: Pokonałeś dyżurnego-bossa, mając piegi.
description.portuguese: Você derrotou o monitor de corredor chefe usando sardas.

description.english: You flung a turd of your own creation at an enemy.
description.german: Du hast einen selbstgemachten Scheißhaufen auf einen Feind geworfen.
description.french: Vous avez lancé un étron de votre propre cru à la face d'un ennemi.
description.italian: Hai lanciato a un nemico uno stronzo di tua produzione.
description.spanish: Has lanzado un ñordo de tu propia creación a un enemigo.
description.russian: Ты запустил во врага какашкой собственного производства.
description.polish: Trafiłeś przeciwnika klockiem własnego wyrobu.
description.brazilian: You flung a turd of your own creation and an enemy.
description.portuguese: Você lançou um cagalhão de sua autoria contra um inimigo.

description.english: While inside Mr. Slave, you summoned Mr. Slave.
description.german: Du hast Mr. Sklave gerufen, während du in Mr. Sklave warst.
description.french: De l'intérieur de M. Esclave, vous avez invoqué M. Esclave.
description.italian: All'interno del signor Maso, hai evocato il signor Maso.
description.spanish: Has invocado al Sr. Esclavo estando dentro del Sr. Esclavo.
description.russian: Ты призвал на подмогу мистера Мазохиста, будучи внутри него.
description.portuguese: Você evocou o Sr. Escravo enquanto estava dentro dele.
description.polish: Wezwałeś Pana Niewolnika, będąc wewnątrz Pana Niewolnika.
description.brazilian: While inside Mr. Slave, you summoned Mr. Slave.

description.english: You found Jesus while playing as a Jew.
description.german: Du hast Jesus gefunden, während du als Jude gespielt hast.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé Jésus en jouant la classe Juif.
description.italian: Hai trovato Gesù mentre giocavi come ebreo.
description.spanish: Has encontrado a Jesús jugando como un judío.
description.russian: Ты нашел Иисуса, будучи в роли еврея.
description.polish: Znalazłeś Jezusa, grając jako Żyd.
description.brazilian: You found Jesus while playing as a Jew.
description.portuguese: Você encontrou Jesus enquanto estava jogando como Judeu.

description.english: You opened all of the garages in South Park.
description.german: Du hast alle Garagen in South Park geöffnet.
description.french: Vous avez ouvert tous les garages dans South Park.
description.italian: Hai aperto tutti i garage di South Park.
description.spanish: Has abierto todos los garajes de South Park.
description.russian: Ты открыл все гаражи в Южном парке.
description.polish: Otworzyłeś wszystkie garaże w South Parku.
description.brazilian: You opened all of the garages in South Park.
description.portuguese: Você abriu todas as garagens de South Park.

description.english: You completed the game without selling any items.
description.german: Du hast das Spiel beendet, ohne irgendwelche Gegenstände zu verkaufen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu sans vendre aucun objet.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco senza vendere nessun oggetto.
description.spanish: Has acabado el juego sin vender ningún objeto.
description.russian: Ты прошел всю игру, не продав ни одного предмета.
description.polish: Ukończyłeś grę, nie sprzedając niczego.
description.brazilian: You completed the game without selling any items.
description.portuguese: Você completou o jogo sem vender nenhum item.

description.english: You defeated Princess Kenny while looking like David Hasselhoff.
description.german: Du hast Prinzessin Kenny besiegt, während du wie David Hasselhoff ausgesehen hast.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu la princesse Kenny en prenant l'identité de David Hasselhoff.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la Principessa Kenny mentre avevi l'aspetto di David Hasselhoff.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la princesa Kenny con el aspecto de David Hasselhoff.
description.russian: Ты победил принцессу Кенни, будучи в обличье Дэвида Хассельхоффа.
description.portuguese: Você derrotou a Princesa Kenny fantasiado de David Hasselhoff.
description.polish: Pokonałeś księżniczkę Kenny, wyglądając jak David Hasselhoff.
description.brazilian: You defeated Princess Kenny while looking like David Hasselhoff.

description.english: You farted on four major authority figures.
description.german: Du hast auf vier wichtige Autoritätsfiguren gefurzt.
description.french: Vous avez pété sur quatre grandes personnalités.
description.italian: Hai scoreggiato addosso a quattro autorità.
description.spanish: Te has peído en cuatro autoridades de nivel.
description.russian: Ты пукнул на четырех главных представителей власти.
description.polish: Napierdziałeś na czworo przedstawicieli wyższych władz.
description.brazilian: You farted on four major authority figures.
description.portuguese: Você peidou em quatro autoridades importantes.

description.english: You shat your pants during a boss battle.
description.german: Du hast dir während eines Bosskampfes in die Hose geschissen.
description.french: Vous avez chié dans votre froc lors d'un combat contre un boss.
description.italian: Ti sei cagato addosso durante una battaglia con un boss.
description.spanish: Te has cagado durante una batalla contra un jefe.
description.russian: Ты наложил в штаны в битве с боссом.
description.polish: Zesrałeś się podczas walki z bossem.
description.brazilian: You shat your pants during a boss battle.
description.portuguese: Você cagou nas calças durante uma batalha de chefe.

description.english: You accepted your fate and chose the name Douchebag yourself.
description.german: Du hast dein Schicksal angenommen und dir selbst den Namen Saftsack gegeben.
description.french: Vous avez accepté votre destin et choisi le nom Connard de votre plein gré.
description.italian: Hai accettato il tuo destino scegliendo il nome di Coglionazzo.
description.spanish: Has aceptado tu destino y elegido el nombre Gilipollas por ti mismo.
description.russian: Ты смирился с судьбой и выбрал себе имя Чмо.
description.portuguese: Você aceitou seu destino e escolheu chamar a si mesmo de Babaca.
description.polish: Pogodziłeś się z losem i sam wybrałeś imię Dekiel.
description.brazilian: You accepted your fate and chose the name Douchebag yourself.

description.english: You've farted on a dog while in gnome form.
description.german: Du hast in Wichtelform auf einen Hundefeind gefurzt.
description.french: Vous avez pété sur un ennemi canin sous la forme d'un gnome.
description.italian: Hai scoreggiato su un cane mentre avevi dimensioni di gnomo.
description.spanish: Te has peído en un perro estando en forma de gnomo.
description.russian: Ты пукнул на собаку, будучи в обличье гнома.
description.polish: Napierdziałeś na psa, będąc pod postacią gnoma.
description.brazilian: You've farted on a dog while in gnome form.
description.portuguese: Você peidou em um cachorro enquanto estava na forma de gnomo.

description.english: You knocked out 3 or more enemies with a single fart outside of battle.
description.german: Du hast außerhalb eines Kampfes 3 oder mehr Feinde mit einem einzelnen Furz ausgeknockt.
description.french: Vous avez touché 3 ennemis minimum avec un seul pet en dehors du combat.
description.italian: Hai messo al tappeto 3 o più nemici con una singola scoreggia al di fuori del combattimento.
description.spanish: Has noqueado a 3 o más enemigos con un único pedo mientras no estabas combatiendo.
description.russian: Ты нокаутировал минимум трех врагов одним пуком вне битвы.
description.polish: Ogłuszyłeś przynajmniej 3 wrogów jednym pierdnięciem poza walką.
description.brazilian: You knocked out 3 or more elves with a single fart outside of battle.
description.portuguese: Você derrubou 3 ou mais inimigos com um único peido fora de combate.

description.english: You defeated Princess Kenny in your girl makeover disguise.
description.german: Du hast Prinzessin Kenny in deiner Umstyling-Verkleidung besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu la princesse Kenny en étant déguisé en fille.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la Principessa Kenny vestito da ragazza.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la princesa Kenny con tu disfraz de nuevo look de chica.
description.russian: Ты победил принцессу Кенни, будучи в образе девочки.
description.portuguese: Você derrotou a Princesa Kenny usando o disfarce da transformação.
description.polish: Pokonałeś księżniczkę Kenny w dziewczęcym makijażu.
description.brazilian: You defeated Princess Kenny in your girl makeover disguise.

description.english: You've farted on every buddy in the game.
description.german: Du hast auf jeden verfügbaren Begleiter im Spiel gefurzt.
description.french: Vous avez pété sur chaque pote disponible dans le jeu.
description.italian: Hai scoreggiato su ogni amico del gioco.
description.spanish: Te has peído en todos los colegas disponibles en el juego.
description.russian: Ты пукнул на каждого напарника в игре.
description.polish: Napierdziałeś na każdego kumpla w grze.
description.brazilian: You've farted on every buddy in the game.
description.portuguese: Você peidou em cada um dos amigos disponíveis no jogo.

description.english: You interrupted 5 channel attacks by using a fart.
description.german: Du hast 5 Beschwörungsangriffe mit einem Furz unterbrochen.
description.french: Vous avez interrompu 5 attaques de concentration avec un pet.
description.italian: Hai interrotto 5 attacchi canalizzati con una scoreggia.
description.spanish: Has interrumpido 5 ataques de canalización con un pedo.
description.russian: Посредством пука ты прервал 5 подготовок к заклинаниям.
description.polish: Przerwałeś pierdnięciem 5 ataków kumulowanych.
description.brazilian: You interrupted 5 channel attacks by using a fart.
description.portuguese: Você interrompeu 5 ataques de canalização com um peido.

description.english: You defeated the Meth Tweekers while wearing the Evil Cartman goatee and bald cap.
description.german: Du hast die Meth-Dealer besiegt, während du Böser-Cartman-Spitzbart und Glatzenmütze getragen hast.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu les accros au crack en portant le bouc de Cartman maléfique et le faux crâne.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto i tossici indossando il pizzetto da Cartman malvagio e la calotta da pelato.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a los traficantes de anfetas llevando la perilla de Cartman malo y la peluca de calvo.
description.russian: Ты надел бородку злого Картмана и шапочку-лысину и в таком виде победил метамфетаминщиков.
description.polish: Pokonałeś speedowych Tweekerów, mając bródkę nikczemnego Cartmana i łysą czachę.
description.brazilian: You defeated the Meth Tweekers while wearing the Evil Cartman goatee and bald cap.
description.portuguese: Você derrotou os viciados usando o cavanhaque e a careca do Cartman Malvado.

description.english: You defeated Princess Kenny while living with Dire AIDS.
description.german: Du hast Prinzessin Kenny besiegt, während du an Düster-AIDS gelitten hast.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu la princesse Kenny en étant atteint de l'affreux SIDA.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la Principessa Kenny mentre eri affetto da Meta-AIDS.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la princesa Kenny estando enfermo de SIDA huargo.
description.russian: Ты победил принцессу Кенни, болея лютым СПИДом.
description.portuguese: Você derrotou a Princesa Kenny enquanto estava com AIDS Atroz.
description.polish: Pokonałeś księżniczkę Kenny, mając paskudne AIDS.
description.brazilian: You defeated Princess Kenny while living with Dire AIDS.

description.english: You watched your parents have sex for 60 seconds.
description.german: Du hast 60 Sekunden lang zugeschaut, wie deine Eltern Sex haben.
description.french: Vous avez regardé vos parents faire l'amour pendant 60 secondes.
description.italian: Hai guardato i tuoi genitori fare sesso per 60 secondi.
description.spanish: Has visto a tus padres haciendo cochinadas durante 60 segundos.
description.russian: В течение 60 секунд ты смотрел, как твои родители занимаются сексом.
description.portuguese: Você assistiu os seus pais fazendo sexo durante 60 segundos.
description.polish: Przez 60 sekund podglądałeś swoich rodziców uprawiających seks.
description.brazilian: You watched your parents have sex for 30 seconds. Hope you are proud of yourself.

description.english: You successfully blocked every enemy attack in a single (non-tutorial) battle.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich jeden feindlichen Angriff in einem Kampf (außerhalb des Tutorials) geblockt.
description.french: Vous avez réussi à bloquer chaque attaque ennemie lors d'un combat unique (sans didacticiel).
description.italian: Hai parato con successo ogni attacco nemico in una sola battaglia al di fuori del tutorial.
description.spanish: Has bloqueado con éxito todos los ataques enemigos en una misma batalla (no del tutorial).
description.russian: Ты успешно заблокировал каждую атаку врагов в одном сражении (кроме обучающего боя).
description.polish: Skutecznie zablokowałeś każdy atak przeciwnika w pojedynczej walce poza samouczkiem.
description.brazilian: You successfully blocked every enemy attack in a single (non-tutorial) battle.
description.portuguese: Você bloqueou com sucesso todos os ataques inimigos em uma única batalha fora do tutorial.

description.english: You farted on 10 enemies in the world that were knocked out.
description.german: Du hast auf 10 Feinde in der Spielwelt gefurzt, die bereits am Boden waren.
description.french: Vous avez pété sur 10 ennemis dans le monde lorsqu'ils étaient assommés.
description.italian: Hai scoreggiato su 10 nemici che erano già a terra nelle ambientazioni di gioco.
description.spanish: Te has peído en 10 enemigos noqueados en el escenario.
description.russian: Ты пукнул на 10 уже нокаутированных врагов.
description.polish: Napierdziałeś na 10 znokautowanych wrogów poza walką.
description.brazilian: You farted on 10 enemies that were already down.
description.portuguese: Você peidou em 10 inimigos no mundo enquanto estavam nocauteados.

description.english: You defeated 3 enemies in one battle while your buddy was knocked out.
description.german: Du hast 3 Feinde in einem Kampf besiegt, während dein Begleiter bewusstlos war.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu au moins 3 ennemis en un combat alors que votre pote était assommé.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 3 nemici in una battaglia quando il tuo amico non era cosciente.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a 3 enemigos en una batalla en la que tu colega estaba inconsciente.
description.russian: Ты победил 3 врагов в одной битве, пока твой напарник был в отключке.
description.polish: Pokonałeś przynajmniej 3 przeciwników w jednej walce, w czasie gdy twój kumpel był nieprzytomny.
description.brazilian: You defeated 3 enemies in one battle while your buddy was knocked out.
description.portuguese: Você derrotou 3 inimigos em uma batalha enquanto seu amigo estava inconsciente.

description.english: You completed the game and never ended a battle with your buddy knocked out.
description.german: Du hast das Spiel beendet, ohne dass dein Begleiter je am Ende eines Kampfs ausgeknockt war.
description.french: Vous avez fini le jeu sans jamais terminer un combat avec votre pote assommé.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco e non hai mai terminato una battaglia con il tuo amico KO.
description.spanish: Has terminado el juego y nunca has acabado un combate con tu colega noqueado.
description.russian: Ты прошел всю игру так, что твой напарник ни разу не оказался в нокауте в конце битвы.
description.polish: Ukończyłeś całą grę, ani razu nie kończąc walki, gdy twój kumpel był nieprzytomny.
description.brazilian: You completed the game and never ended a battle with your buddy knocked out.
description.portuguese: Você completou o jogo sem terminar um combate com um amigo nocauteado.

description.english: You collected 5 Chinpokomon.
description.german: Du hast 5 Chinpokomon gesammelt.
description.french: Vous avez collecté 5 Chinpokomon.
description.italian: Hai collezionato 5 Chinpokomon.
description.spanish: Has conseguido 5 Chinpokomon.
description.russian: Ты собрал 5 Чинпокомонов.
description.polish: Zebrałeś 5 chinpokomonów.
description.brazilian: You collected 5 Chinpokomon.
description.portuguese: Você coletou 5 Chinpokomons.

description.english: You collected 15 Chinpokomon.
description.german: Du hast 15 Chinpokomon gesammelt.
description.french: Vous avez collecté 15 Chinpokomon.
description.italian: Hai collezionato 15 Chinpokomon.
description.spanish: Has conseguido 15 Chinpokomon.
description.russian: Ты собрал 15 Чинпокомонов.
description.polish: Zebrałeś 15 chinpokomonów.
description.brazilian: You collected 15 Chinpokomon.
description.portuguese: Você coletou 15 Chinpokomons.

description.english: You collected all of the Chinpokomon.
description.german: Du hast alle Chinpokomon gesammelt.
description.french: Vous avez collecté tous les Chinpokomon.
description.italian: Hai collezionato tutti i Chinpokomon.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todos los Chinpokomon.
description.russian: Ты собрал всех Чинпокомонов.
description.polish: Zebrałeś wszystkie chinpokomony.
description.brazilian: You collected all of the Chinpokomon.
description.portuguese: Você coletou todos os Chinpokomons.

description.english: You befriended your father.
description.german: Du hast deinen Vater als Freund hinzugefügt.
description.french: Vous avez sympathisé avec votre père.
description.italian: Hai fatto amicizia con tuo padre.
description.spanish: Te has hecho amigo de tu padre.
description.russian: Ты подружился с собственным отцом.
description.polish: Zaprzyjaźniłeś się ze swoim tatą.
description.brazilian: You befriended your father.
description.portuguese: Você ficou amigo do seu pai.

description.english: You made friends with half of South Park.
description.german: Du hast halb South Park als Freund hinzugefügt.
description.french: Vous avez sympathisé avec la moitié de South Park.
description.italian: Hai fatto amicizia con mezza South Park.
description.spanish: Te has hecho amigo de la mitad de South Park.
description.russian: Ты подружился с половиной Южного парка.
description.polish: Zaprzyjaźniłeś się z połową South Parku.
description.brazilian: You made friends with half of South Park.
description.portuguese: Você ficou amigo da metade de South Park.

description.english: Everyone in South Park is your friend.
description.german: Alle in South Park sind mit dir befreundet.
description.french: Tout South Park est votre ami.
description.italian: Tutti gli abitanti di South Park sono tuoi amici.
description.spanish: Todo el mundo en South Park es tu amigo.
description.russian: Каждый житель Южного парка — твой друг.
description.polish: Zaprzyjaźniłeś się ze wszystkimi w South Parku.
description.brazilian: Everyone in South Park is your friend.
description.portuguese: Você ficou amigo de toda South Park.

description.english: You sold 300 junk items.
description.german: Du hast 300 Schrottgegenstände verkauft.
description.french: Vous avez vendu 300 objets de pacotille.
description.italian: Hai venduto 300 oggetti inutili.
description.spanish: Has vendido 300 objetos de basura.
description.russian: Ты продал 300 предметов из барахла.
description.polish: Sprzedałeś 300 fantów.
description.brazilian: You sold 300 junk items.
description.portuguese: Você vendeu 300 itens inúteis.

description.english: You defeated Princess Kenny and recovered the Stick of Truth.
description.german: Du hast Prinzessin Kenny besiegt und den Stab der Wahrheit zurückgeholt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu la princesse Kenny et récupéré le Bâton de la Vérité.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la Principessa Kenny e recuperato il Bastone della Verità.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a la princesa Kenny y recuperado la Vara de la Verdad.
description.russian: Ты победил принцессу Кенни и забрал Палку Истины.
description.portuguese: Você derrotou a Princesa Kenny e recuperou o Cajado da Verdade.
description.polish: Pokonałeś księżniczkę Kenny i odzyskałeś Kijek Prawdy.
description.brazilian: You defeated Princess Kenny and recovered the Stick of Truth.

description.english: You defeated 20 enemies using Cartman's Ass.
description.german: Du hast 20 Feinde mit Cartmans Arsch besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu 20 ennemis avec le cul de Cartman.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 20 nemici usando il culo di Cartman.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a 20 enemigos utilizando el culo de Cartman.
description.russian: Ты победил 20 врагов при помощи задницы Картмана.
description.polish: Pokonałeś 20 wrogów dupą Cartmana.
description.brazilian: You defeated 20 enemies using Cartman's Ass.
description.portuguese: Você derrotou 20 inimigos com a bunda do Cartman.

description.english: You've farted on people 100 times.
description.german: Du hast 100 Mal auf Leute gefurzt.
description.french: Vous avez pété 100 fois sur des gens.
description.italian: Hai scoreggiato 100 volte sulle persone.
description.spanish: Te has peído en gente 100 veces.
description.russian: Ты пукнул на людей 100 раз.
description.polish: Napierdziałeś 100 razy na ludzi.
description.brazilian: You've farted on people 300 times.
description.portuguese: Você peidou em pessoas 100 vezes.

description.english: You've farted on animals 25 times.
description.german: Du hast 25 Mal auf Tiere gefurzt.
description.french: Vous avez pété 25 fois sur des animaux.
description.italian: Hai scoreggiato 25 volte su animali.
description.spanish: Te has peído en animales 25 veces.
description.russian: Ты пукнул на животных 25 раз.
description.polish: Napierdziałeś 25 razy na zwierzęta.
description.brazilian: You've farted on animals 25 times.
description.portuguese: Você peidou em animais 25 vezes.

description.english: In three separate battles, you've taken a shit in your pants.
description.german: Du hast dir in drei separaten Kämpfen eingeschissen.
description.french: Vous avez chié dans votre froc lors de trois combats distincts.
description.italian: In tre diverse battaglie ti sei cagato addosso.
description.spanish: Te has cagado en los pantalones en tres combates distintos.
description.russian: Ты наложил в штаны в трех разных битвах.
description.polish: Zesrałeś się w trzech różnych walkach.
description.brazilian: In three separate battles, you've taken a shit in your pants.
description.portuguese: Você cagou nas calças em três batalhas separadas.

description.english: You have collected half of the available costume sets.
description.german: Du hast die Hälfte der verfügbaren Kostümgegenstände gesammelt.
description.french: Vous avez collecté la moitié des pièces de costume disponibles.
description.italian: Hai raccolto metà dei set di costumi disponibili.
description.spanish: Has conseguido la mitad de los objetos de traje disponibles.
description.russian: Ты заполучил половину доступных наборов костюмов.
description.polish: Skompletowałeś połowę z dostępnych kostiumów.
description.brazilian: You have collected half of the available costumes items.
description.portuguese: Você coletou metade dos conjuntos de fantasias disponíveis.

description.english: You've collected all of the available costumes.
description.german: Du hast alle verfügbaren Kostüme gesammelt.
description.french: Vous avez collecté tous les costumes disponibles.
description.italian: Hai raccolto tutti i costumi disponibili.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todos los trajes disponibles.
description.russian: Ты заполучил все доступные наборы костюмов.
description.polish: Skompletowałeś wszystkie dostępne kostiumy.
description.brazilian: You've collected all of the available costumes.
description.portuguese: Você coletou todos os conjuntos de fantasias disponíveis.

description.english: You farted on the corpse of an aborted Nazi Zombie fetus.
description.german: Du hast auf die Leiche eines abgetriebenen Nazi-Zombie-Fötus gefurzt.
description.french: Vous avez pété sur le cadavre d'un fœtus zombie nazi avorté.
description.italian: Hai scoreggiato sul cadavere di un feto zombi nazi abortito.
description.spanish: Te has peído sobre el cadáver de un feto de nazi zombi abortado.
description.russian: Ты пукнул на труп абортированного зомби-фашистского плода.
description.portuguese: Você peidou no cadáver de um feto zumbi nazista abortado.
description.polish: Napierdziałeś na martwy płód nazizombiaka po aborcji.
description.brazilian: You farted on the corpse of an aborted Nazi Zombie fetus.

description.english: You befriended both crab people and gnomes.
description.german: Du hast dich mit den Krebsmenschen und den Wichteln angefreundet.
description.french: Vous avez sympathisé avec les hommes crabes et les gnomes.
description.italian: Hai fatto amicizia sia con gli uomini granchio che con gli gnomi.
description.spanish: Te has hecho amigo de la gente cangrejo y de los gnomos.
description.russian: Ты подружился с людьми-крабами и гномами.
description.polish: Zaprzyjaźniłeś się z ludźmi-krabami i z gnomami.
description.brazilian: You befriended both crab people and gnomes.
description.portuguese: Você ficou amigo do povo Caranguejo e dos gnomos das cuecas.

description.english: Over the course of the game, you've scored 100 perfect attacks.
description.german: Du hast während des Spiels 100 perfekte Angriffe durchgeführt.
description.french: En cours de partie, vous avez réalisé 100 attaques parfaites.
description.italian: Nel corso del gioco hai messo a segno 100 attacchi perfetti.
description.spanish: Has realizado 100 ataques perfectos a lo largo del juego.
description.russian: За всю игру ты выполнил 100 идеальных атак.
description.polish: Wykonałeś 100 idealnych ataków w trakcie całej gry.
description.brazilian: Over the course of the game, you've scored 100 perfect attacks.
description.portuguese: Você obteve 100 ataques perfeitos durante o jogo.

description.english: Over the course of the game, you've blocked 100 attacks.
description.german: Du hast während des Spiels 100 Angriffe geblockt.
description.french: En cours de partie, vous avez bloqué 100 attaques.
description.italian: Nel corso del gioco hai parato 100 attacchi.
description.spanish: Has bloqueado 100 ataques a lo largo del juego.
description.russian: За всю игру ты заблокировал 100 атак.
description.polish: Zablokowałeś 100 ataków w trakcie całej gry.
description.brazilian: Over the course of the game, you've blocked 100 attacks.
description.portuguese: Você bloqueou 100 ataques durante o jogo.

description.english: You've let Kenny die in combat 10 times over the course of the game.
description.german: Du hast Kenny während des Spiels 10 Mal im Kampf sterben lassen.
description.french: Vous avez laissé Kenny mourir 10 fois au combat en cours de partie.
description.italian: Hai lasciato morire Kenny in battaglia 10 volte nel corso del gioco.
description.spanish: Has dejado que Kenny muriera 10 veces en combate a lo largo del juego.
description.russian: В течение всей игры ты позволил Кенни умереть в битве 10 раз.
description.polish: Doprowadziłeś 10-krotnie do śmierci Kenny'ego w walce w ciągu całej gry.
description.brazilian: You've let Kenny die in combat 10 times over the course of the game.
description.portuguese: Você deixou o Kenny morrer 10 vezes em batalha durante o jogo.

description.english: You've unlocked all of the upgrades for a New Kid ability.
description.german: Du hast alle Aufwertungen für eine Fähigkeit des Neuen freigeschaltet.
description.french: Vous avez débloqué toutes les améliorations associées à une aptitude du Nouveau.
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutte le migliorie per un'abilità del Novellino.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todas las mejoras de una habilidad del niño nuevo.
description.russian: Ты разблокировал все улучшения к одной из способностей Новичка.
description.polish: Odblokowałeś wszystkie ulepszenia jednej zdolności Nowego.
description.brazilian: You've unlocked all of the upgrades for a New Kid ability.
description.portuguese: Você desbloqueou todas as melhorias para uma das habilidades do Novato.

description.english: You've spent $500.
description.german: Du hast 500 $ ausgegeben.
description.french: Vous avez dépensé 500 $.
description.italian: Hai speso 500$.
description.spanish: Has gastado 500 $.
description.russian: Ты потратил 500 долларов.
description.polish: Wydałeś 500 dolarów.
description.brazilian: You've spent $500.
description.portuguese: Você gastou $500.

description.english: You own all the weapons and costumes available in the game.
description.german: Du besitzt alle im Spiel verfügbaren Waffen und Kostüme.
description.french: Vous avez acquis tous les costumes et armes disponibles dans le jeu.
description.italian: Possiedi tutte le armi e i costumi disponibili nel gioco.
description.spanish: Dispones de todas las armas y trajes del juego.
description.russian: Ты заполучил все оружие и все костюмы в игре.
description.polish: Posiadasz wszystkie typy broni i wszystkie kostiumy w grze.
description.brazilian: You own all the weapons and costumes available in the game.
description.portuguese: Você possui todas as armas e fantasias disponíveis no jogo.
